title: Why aren't my Hextech Chests appearing
body: My Teammates have been getting S ranks and in return all i get  are key fragments. it says i have 4 chests available so why am i getting none, do I have to get a S?

replies.body:
From your match history, it looks like you've been playing a good deal of matches as Yasuo. You can only get one chest per champion, per season. Essentially, you will not get another chest from playing Yasuo for the rest of the season. 

Be sure to look over all the [**Hextech Crafting Guidelines**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for the details on how these chests work.
